successes.title: Anova Precision Cooker - Cook sous vide with your phone
successes.description: The Anova Precision Cooker is used to cook "sous vide," which allows anyone to produce restaurant quality results.

Pledges.description: LOVE AND THANKS: Have your name included in the Kickstarter product packaging and on our Website.

ANOVA T-SHIRT: Every dollar helps us reach our goal and to say thank you, we'll send you an Anova t-shirt (sizes s, m, l, xl, and xxl). Plus, your name and photo will be visible on our Website. Your name will be included in our product packaging.

FOUNDERS CLUB: Special pricing for the Anova precision cooker. The unit will retail for $169. Get exclusive product updates and your name and photo featured on our Website and your name included in our product packaging. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
EARLY BIRD: Special pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker - $40 off the retail price. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
EARLY BIRD II: Special pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker. The unit will retail for $169. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
EARLY BIRD III: Special pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker. The unit will retail for $169. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
EARLY BIRD IV: Special pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker. The unit will retail for $169. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
EARLY BIRD V: Special pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker. The unit will retail for $169. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
WHITE ANOVA PRECISION COOKER: Special, early bird pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker. Plus, we'll thank you personally on our Website. Available in either 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.
BLACK ANOVA PRECISION COOKER: Special, early bird pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker. Plus, we'll thank you personally on our Website. Available in 120V + 220V. * FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.

ANOVA PRECISION COOKER: Special, early bird pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker (Note: Due to upgrades, the unit now has an estimated retail price of $179). Plus, we'll thank you personally on our Website. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE.

ANOVA PRECISION COOKER: Special, early bird pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker (Note: Due to upgrades, the unit now has an estimated retail price of $179). Plus, we'll thank you personally on our Website. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V.

ANOVA PRECISION COOKER: Special, early bird pricing on the Anova Precision Cooker (Note: Due to upgrades, the unit now has an estimated retail price of $179). Plus, we'll thank you personally on our Website. Available in either white or black and 120V or 220V.

ANOVA PRECISION COOKER: Be one of the first to get the Anova Precision Cooker (choose from White, Black, or Voter's choice). Get exclusive product updates and your name and photo featured on our Website and your name included in our product packaging. Available in either 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING (U.S. ONLY).

HACKER SPECIAL You'll get early access to the SDK and we'll send you a prototype Anova in August so you can get started coding. You will also receive another Anova in any color when the full batch ships.

SURF AND TURF I: You'll get TWO Anova Precision Cookers, one in white and one in black, so that you can cook multiple dishes at the same time. Special pricing for the Anova precision cooker. Each individual unit will retail for $169. Get exclusive product updates and your name and photo featured on our Website and your name included in our product packaging. Available in either 120V or 220V. FREE SHIPPING (U.S. ONLY).
